Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to restricting sex offenders from residing in a community residence for the mentally disabled
Summary: Relates to restricting sex offenders from residing in a community residence for the mentally disabled.
LawCode: Amd §§168-c, 168-f & 168-k, Cor L; amd §41.44 & 10.11, Ment Hyg L; amd §20, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the mental hygiene law and the social services law, in relation to restricting sex offenders from residing in a community residence for the mentally disabled
